Description: Steatite shabti of P3-di-Imn-m-ipt with a lappet-wig, a modelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in five rows of incised Hieroglyphs; the foot section has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - foot missing, cracked at arm level
